com.fizzikgames.fizlib.pathfinding

Interface AstarHeuristic


  • public interface AstarHeuristic
    Calculates the heuristic cost of a node for the Astar algorithm
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Maxim Tiourin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCost(TileMap map, Mover mover, Node evalNode, Node destNode)
      Returns the heuristic cost of a node for a TileMap taking in consideration the movement costs of the mover.

    • Method Detail

      • getCost

        int getCost(TileMap map,
          Mover mover,
          Node evalNode,
          Node destNode)
        Returns the heuristic cost of a node for a TileMap taking in consideration the movement costs of the mover.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to calculate costs for.
        mover - The mover to consider for.
        evalNode - The node that is being evaluated.
        destNode - The node that is trying to be reached.
        Returns:
        The heuristic cost of the evaluation node.
